title: Leavebuster and LP R.I.P
body:
Game been working for ages, then que'd for ranked. on startup of game "couldn't connect to server" then it tried reloading to old patch and repeated till they surrendered in-game. Thought it was server issue, tried again, repeat. Then tried aram, repeat. Now i lost my precious 40 lb in silver III >.> and got Hella que times cause leave buster thinks im a inconsistent thot{{champion:39}} .

Gib LP back plz. i got robbed. Free promo also welcome. I just won a 4v5 and had dreams of getting outta silver hell but YALL AGAINST ME TOO LIKE MY TOP LANERS <3
